column1: Kata Robata////3. Miso Marinated Black Cod (3/5; grilled miso-marinated Alaskan black cod): You typically cannot go wrong with the Miso black cod
column2: but this one was slightly disappointing. The fish did not seem as fresh as other similar dishes I've tried
column3: and it did not have that melt-in-my-mouth sensation. In addition
column4: it seemed like there was teriyaki sauce at the centerpiece of plate
